statements: SELECT * FROM categories;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_categories FROM categories;
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%technology%' AND parent_category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM categories
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM categories
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_id = 1
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY category_name DESC
SELECT c.category_name, cr.child_category_id FROM categories c JOIN category_relationships cr ON c.category_id = cr.parent_category_id
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL
SELECT c.category_name, cr.child_category_id FROM categories c LEFT JOIN category_relationships cr ON c.category_id = cr.parent_category_id
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT CategoryName, CategoryID FROM Categories ORDER BY CategoryName DESC;
SELECT ItemID, ItemName FROM Items WHERE CategoryID = 2;
SELECT CategoryID, COUNT(*) AS TotalItems FROM Items GROUP BY CategoryID;
SELECT SubCategoryName FROM SubCategories WHERE CategoryID = 1;
SELECT CategoryName FROM Categories WHERE CategoryID = 1;
SELECT ItemName, CategoryName FROM Items JOIN Categories ON Items.CategoryID = Categories.CategoryID;
SELECT SubCategoryName FROM SubCategories WHERE CategoryID = 2 ORDER BY SubCategoryName DESC;
SELECT CategoryName, COUNT(ItemID) AS NumItems FROM Categories LEFT JOIN Items ON Categories.CategoryID = Items.CategoryID GROUP BY CategoryName HAVING NumItems > 5;

SELECT Items.ItemName, SubCategories.SubCategoryName, Categories.CategoryName FROM Items JOIN SubCategories ON Items.CategoryID = SubCategories.CategoryID JOIN Categories ON Items.CategoryID = Categories.CategoryID;
SELECT * FROM categories;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT content_title, category_id FROM content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT c.category_name, cc.category_name AS parent_category FROM categories c LEFT JOIN categories cc ON c.parent_category_id = cc.category_id;
SELECT u.username, c.content_title, uc.user_content_id FROM users u JOIN user_content uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN content c ON uc.content_id = c.content_id;
SELECT * FROM categories;
SELECT category_name, parent_category_id FROM categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT article_title, article_content, category_id FROM articles WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT subcategory_name FROM subcategories WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY subcategory_id ASC;
SELECT article_id, tag_id FROM article_tags WHERE tag_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM articles JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE categories.parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT articles.article_title, categories.category_name FROM articles LEFT JOIN categories ON articles.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE articles.article_id < 10;
SELECT subcategory_name, categories.category_name FROM subcategories JOIN categories ON subcategories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE categories.category_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT article_title, tag_name FROM articles JOIN article_tags ON articles.article_id = article_tags.article_id JOIN tags ON article_tags.tag_id = tags.tag_id WHERE tags.tag_name = 'Programming';
